text: There is a large Mexican diaspora in the United States. Many Mexicans in the United States live in Texas and California. Los Angeles has the largest Mexican population by metropolitan area.The Mexican Diaspora in the United States - Migration Policy Institute There is also a substantial Mexican population in Canada, Spain, Guatemala and Germany.View of Understanding the Rise of Mexican Migration to CanadaMexican Immigrants in the United States ==References== Category:Emigration
title: Mexican diaspora
